item.name: Physical Disk 1 State
item.description: pdState OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX INTEGER ACCESS read-only STATUS optional DESCRIPTION "Firmware\s interpretation of drive state. Values: unconfigured-good(0),unconfigured-bad(1),hot-spare(2),offline(16),failed(17),rebuild(20),online(24),copyback(32),system(64),UNCONFIGURED-SHIELDED(128),HOTSPARE-SHIELDED(130),CONFIGURED-SHIELDED(144)"

item.name: Virtual Disk 1 State
item.description: state OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX INTEGER ACCESS read-only STATUS optional DESCRIPTION "The Device state: Values: offline(0),partially-degraded(1),degraded(2),optimal(3)"

item.name: Virtual Disk 2 State
item.description: state OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX INTEGER ACCESS read-only STATUS optional DESCRIPTION "The Device state: Values: offline(0),partially-degraded(1),degraded(2),optimal(3)"

item.name: Virtual Disk 3 State
item.description: state OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX INTEGER ACCESS read-only STATUS optional DESCRIPTION "The Device state: Values: offline(0),partially-degraded(1),degraded(2),optimal(3)"

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.cpu1.dimm.last()}<1.304 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.cpu2.dimm.last()}<1.304 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.cpu1.dimm.last()}>1.656 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.cpu2.dimm.last()}>1.656
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME}: CPU DIMM Voltage failure

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.cpu1.vcore.last()}<0.824 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.cpu2.vcore.last()}<0.824 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.cpu1.vcore.last()}>1.352 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.cpu2.vcore.last()}>1.352
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME}: CPU Vcore Voltage failure

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.cpu1.vtt.last()}<0.824 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.cpu2.vtt.last()}<0.824 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.cpu1.vtt.last()}>1.512 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.cpu2.vtt.last()}>1.512
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME}: CPU VTT Voltage failure

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.p1.dimm1a.temp.last()}<0 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.p1.dimm1b.temp.last()}<0 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.p1.dimm2a.temp.last()}<0 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.p1.dimm2b.temp.last()}<0 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.p1.dimm3a.temp.last()}<0 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.p1.dimm3b.temp.last()}<0 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.p2.dimm1a.temp.last()}<0 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.p2.dimm1b.temp.last()}<0 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.p2.dimm2a.temp.last()}<0 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.p2.dimm2b.temp.last()}<0 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.p2.dimm3a.temp.last()}<0 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.p2.dimm3b.temp.last()}<0 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.p1.dimm1a.temp.last()}>81 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.p1.dimm1b.temp.last()}>81 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.p1.dimm2a.temp.last()}>81 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.p1.dimm2b.temp.last()}>81 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.p1.dimm3a.temp.last()}>81 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.p1.dimm3b.temp.last()}>81 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.p2.dimm1a.temp.last()}>81 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.p2.dimm1b.temp.last()}>81 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.p2.dimm2a.temp.last()}>81 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.p2.dimm2b.temp.last()}>81 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.p2.dimm3a.temp.last()}>81 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.p2.dimm3b.temp.last()}>81
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME}: DIMM Temp is failure

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.fan1.last()}<675 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.fan2.last()}<675 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.fan3.last()}<675 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.fan4.last()}<675 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.fan5.last()}<675 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.fan6.last()}<675 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.fan7.last()}<675 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.fan8.last()}<675 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.fan1.last()}>34155 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.fan2.last()}>34155 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.fan3.last()}>34155 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.fan4.last()}>34155 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.fan5.last()}>34155 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.fan6.last()}>34155 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.fan7.last()}>34155 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:ipmi.fan8.last()}>34155
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME}: Fan is failure

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI SuperMicro:pdState.1.last()}<>24 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:pdState.2.last()}<>24 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:pdState.3.last()}<>24 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:pdState.4.last()}<>24 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:pdState.5.last()}<>24 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:pdState.6.last()}<>24 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:pdState.7.last()}<>24 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:pdState.8.last()}<>24 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:pdState.9.last()}<>24 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:pdState.10.last()}<>24 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:pdState.11.last()}<>24 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:pdState.12.last()}<>24 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:pdState.13.last()}<>24 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:pdState.14.last()}<>24 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:pdState.15.last()}<>24 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:pdState.16.last()}<>24 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:pdState.17.last()}<>24 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:pdState.18.last()}<>24 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:pdState.19.last()}<>24 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:pdState.20.last()}<>24 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:pdState.21.last()}<>24 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:pdState.22.last()}<>24 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:pdState.23.last()}<>24 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:pdState.24.last()}<>24
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME}: Physical Disk is failure

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI SuperMicro:vdState.1.last()}<>3 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:vdState.2.last()}<>3 or {Template IPMI SuperMicro:vdState.3.last()}<>3
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME}: Virtual Disk is failure
